body: I've been doing some 1v1s on kohi lately. Most of the time, whenever I try to pot, they miss me completely. How do I throw the pot so it actually hits me? I'm kinda getting annoyed.
body_tagged: I've been doing some 1v1s on kohi lately. Most of the time, whenever I try to pot, they miss me completely. How do I throw the pot so it actually hits me? I'm kinda getting annoyed.
title: How to throw pots?

replies.body: Um, it's probably your ping... You're from Singapore right? If you play on kohi US yeah that means it's just you ping, it won't land exactly on you, delayed.
replies.body_tagged: Um, it's probably your ping... You're from Singapore right? If you play on kohi US yeah that means it's just you ping, it won't land exactly on you, delayed.

replies.body: So where do I aim when I throw it?
replies.body_tagged: So where do I aim when I throw it?

reply_to.body: Um, it's probably your ping... You're from Singapore right? If you play on kohi US yeah that means it's just you ping, it won't land exactly on you, delayed.
reply_to.body_tagged: Um, it's probably your ping... You're from Singapore right? If you play on kohi US yeah that means it's just you ping, it won't land exactly on you, delayed.

replies.body:
I have about the same as Blaze's ping and the pots I throw on Kohi US still lands on me.

Basically just look straight, run forward and throw your pot, well, that's what I do.
replies.body_tagged:
I have about the same as Blaze's ping and the pots I throw on Kohi US still lands on me.

Basically just look straight, run forward and throw your pot, well, that's what I do.

replies.body: Play gapple instead, wayyy better and no pot lag :D
replies.body_tagged: Play gapple instead, wayyy better and no pot lag :D

replies.body:
when the opponent rekts you and you refill your pots throw it
and deal with it
replies.body_tagged:
when the opponent rekts you and you refill your pots throw it
and deal with it

replies.body: If you are far away from the enemy throw them above your head for Max Power
replies.body_tagged: If you are far away from the enemy throw them above your head for Max Power

replies.body: I turn around, throw my pots, and none of them hit ;-; That's the whole point of me making this thread.

replies.body: Just look straight and look downward barely just a bit and throw your pots, they hit you more often rather than throwing them straight down at the ground.
replies.body_tagged: Just look straight and look downward barely just a bit and throw your pots, they hit you more often rather than throwing them straight down at the ground.

replies.body:
As emmaye said, look straight and a little bit down
You gotta also be moving forward during this btw

As emmaye said, look straight and a little bit down

replies.body:
Throw them forwards and like run into them.
If you're in a calm situation,  throw them straight up in the air.
replies.body_tagged:
Throw them forwards and like run into them.
If you're in a calm situation,  throw them straight up in the air.

replies.body: I would personally look down and throw pots or look up. That's my style so yea find a method that suits ur style ^ ^
replies.body_tagged: I would personally look down and throw pots or look up. That's my style so yea find a method that suits ur style ^ ^

replies.body: Throw them to your opponent and he will throw them back to you and heal you hope it helps
replies.body_tagged: Throw them to your opponent and he will throw them back to you and heal you hope it helps

replies.body:
Blaze run straight and aim like right at the middle of ur player and u should get around 3 and half to 4 hearts
If u throw above your head I'm pretty sure it's 4 hearts
